attributes.action: Force Southern Rail to sell the train line to TFL!
attributes.additional_details: Not once have they held themselves accountable for their unprofessional service nor sought help or advise from other professional train companies. With the ever increasing rents and thousands of Londoners moving to the outer zones it is now more fundamental than ever to have an effective and reliable train service to these areas that are increasing rapidly in population.
attributes.background: Southern Rail has been providing an extremely inconsistent,low quality service on their train line for the past year. This has made a major impact of thousands of people lives by making them late for work, appointments, marriage counselling, doctors appointments, lectures and many other activities.
